item.description:
Debbie came up with a good idea for a ride on saturday. She found out that there is a free cookout at Shooters in Wareham sat. afternoon at 2:00.
So here is the plan, We thought we could meet at Friendlys in Middleboro around 10:00 and leave at 10:30. From there just ride all over the place and end up at the cookout at Shooters at 2:00. I know most people probly have plans already for the fourth, but if anyone is interested and of course if it's not raining . Darn! Then by all means come ride with us. I am going to finally take my baby out for a ride.....
If you could send this info out to the group, that would be great.
I hope all is well, hope to see you soon.
Thanks
Judi


Meet at Middleboro rotary friendly's at 10am and leave at 10:30am
item.name: Wareham ride
